src_original: yātī tai rbhāṣito buddhai bhīṣiṣpate vakra nāgataiḥ ||  pratyūtpanaiśca saṁbūddhairyā bhāṣate pūnaḥ pūnaḥ || 12 ||
tgt_original: 過去佛已說　　未來佛當說 現在佛今說　　三世皆如是

src_original: māyājāle mahātaṁtre yāvasmināṁ pragīyate ||  mahāvaja dharai dvaṣṭai ramayai maṁtra dhāribhiḥ || 13 ||
tgt_original: 於大幻網中　　能度諸群品 金剛掌菩薩　　歡喜伸讚歎

src_original: ahaṁ cainā dhārāyiṣyāmi nirpāṇaṁca dṛḍhāśayaḥ ||  yathābhavāmpahaṁnātha sarva saṁbūddha guhyadhṛka || 14 ||
tgt_original: 佛說真密語　　我今能受持 決定心堅固　　至成等正覺

src_original: prakāśayiṣa-ape satvānāṁ yathāśaya viśeṣataḥ ||
tgt_original: 演說祕密法　　引導諸眾生

src_original: (9) āśiṣaṇā jñāna gāthā ṣoḍaśaḥ || 0 ||  athaśa-ākyamuni bhargavāna buddhīdvipadottamaḥ nirṇṇamayyāpatāṁ tāṁsvajivhāṁsva- mukhācchubhāṁ || 1 ||
tgt_original: 爾時釋迦佛　　最上兩足尊

src_original: mahābhavādrisaṁbhettā mahāvaja dharodhanaḥ || 14 || ||  mahākrūro mahāraudro mahābhaya bhayaṁkaraḥ || 13 || ||
tgt_original: 大金剛祕密　　大忿怒威猛 大怖畏能除　　大最勝明王

src_original: mahāvidhītamonātho mahāmaṁtrotta māgūra | || ||  mahāyāna nayābūḍho mahāyāna nayottamaḥ || 14 ||
tgt_original: 大乘最上行　　大乘法增長

src_original: vajadhātu mahāmaśalagāthā ceturdaśaḥ || 14 || ||  mahāvairocano buddho mahāmaunī mahā- munīḥ || ||
tgt_original: 大毘盧遮佛　　大寂默牟尼 出生大呪部　　成就祕密法

src_original: daśapāramitā prāpto daśapāramitāśruyaḥ || ||  daśapāramitā śuddhirdaśapāramitānayaḥ || 2 || ||
tgt_original: 依十波羅蜜　　修習殊勝行 得十波羅蜜　　清淨妙法門 十種波羅蜜　　如來本真智

src_original: daśabhumi śvarānāthoda daśabhumīśvaronātho daśabhūmī pratichitaḥ ||
tgt_original: 十地自在行　　十地安隱住

src_original: daśajñāna viśuddhātmā daśāna viśuddhidhṛkaḥ || 3 || ||
tgt_original: 十智清淨身　　十智功德聚

src_original: daśākārā daśārthīryo munīṁdro daśabalo vittuḥ || ||  aśeṣa viśvārthakaro daśākāra vaśīmahānu || 4 || ||
tgt_original: 十相十義利　　牟尼十力尊 十相廣大行　　周遍悉圓滿

src_original: dhāriṇīsaṁgraha bhūtavādī tathāvādī tathākārī ananya vāk || 5 ||
tgt_original: 真語與實語　　如語不異語

src_original: advayau dvayavādī ca bhūta koṭī vyavāstitaḥ nairāmya siṁha nirnādaḥ kutīrthya mṛga bhīkaraḥ || 6 ||
tgt_original: 無二非無二　　如實際安住

src_original: sarvasatva manāṁtaskaḥ sarvasatvamanovatiḥ || 21 ||
tgt_original: 一切眾生心　　了境界清淨 一切眾生心　　平等無差別 一切眾生心　　歡喜生愛樂

src_original: saṁdigdhamatityadhvaḥ sarvārthatriguṇātmakaḥ || 22 ||  (25) skandhārtha triṣkālaḥ sarvakṣaṇa vibhāvakaḥ ekakṣaṇābhi saṁbuddhaḥ sarvvabuddha svabhāvadhṛka || 23 ||
tgt_original: 通達三世法　　一切智慧義 五蘊性本空　　三世皆如是 一念生信解　　即見諸佛性

src_original: sarvasaṁbuddha bodhiṇyo buddha ṣodhisānuttaraḥ ||
tgt_original: 樂聞佛菩提　　最上真實義

src_original: anakṣaromaṁtrayonirmahāmaṁtrakṛtrayaḥ || 1 ||
tgt_original: 大呪離文字　　大呪三種性

src_original: sarvamaprārthajanako mahābiṁdūsnakṣara ||
tgt_original: 泯覩離文字　　出生一切呪

src_original: paṁcākṣaro mahāśūnyo biṁdū śūnyaḥ || 2 ||
tgt_original: 泯覩百字門　　五字門大空

src_original: sarvākāra nirākāraḥ ṣoḍaśārddhāddha biṁdūṣṭak ||
tgt_original: 祕密十六種　　從泯覩中生

src_original: akalaḥ kalānātīt- ścaturthadhyānakoṭiṣṭaka || 3 ||
tgt_original: 葛羅非葛羅　　過去有四種 禪義生億數　　一切作非作

src_original: sarvadhmanakalābhijñaḥ samādhikula gotravit ||
tgt_original: 通達一切禪　　了知根本定

src_original: samādhikāya kāyāggraḥ sarvasaṁtagakāyarāṭa || 4 ||  nirmāṇakāyakāyāgyo buddha nirmāṇa vaṁdhṛka ||
tgt_original: 三昧身最上　　報化身亦然

src_original: daśābdigviśvinirmāṇo yathavajagadarśakṛta || 5 ||
tgt_original: 普遍十方界　　化度諸眾生

src_original: devāti devo deveṁdraḥ suroṁdro dājavādhipaḥ ||
tgt_original: 最後天中天　　吉祥最勝者 為天人導師　　降伏諸魔眾

src_original: rtha pramatthaśvaraḥ || 6 ||  prakhyātad śadigaloka dharṇadānapatiḥ mahāna || 7 ||
tgt_original: 如帝釋天王　　能作大布施 度一切眾生　　出煩惱稠林 十方皆讚歎　　唯一無有二

src_original: maitrīsannāha sannaścaḥ ruṇāvarma varmitaḥ ||
tgt_original: 以大慈悲法　　為精進甲冑

src_original: prajñākhaḍaga dhanurvāṇa kleśā jñānaraṇaṁjabhaḥ |  mororimora jindīra śa-acaturmārabhayāṁta śat ||
tgt_original: 智慧為弓劍　　滅除煩惱賊

src_original: gaṁbhīrāthā mūdārārthā mahārthāma samāṁśivā ||  ādi madhyāte katpāśī nāma saṁgīti muttamo || 11 ||
tgt_original: 甚深微妙義　　大法無等倫 於初中後善　　名義為最勝
